    • Uses of Context in io.vertx.core

      Fields in io.vertx.core declared as Context 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Context AbstractVerticle.context
      Reference to the context of the verticle
      Methods in io.vertx.core that return Context 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Context Vertx.currentContext()
      Gets the current context
      Context Context.exceptionHandler(Handler<Throwable> handler)
      Set an exception handler called when the context runs an action throwing an uncaught throwable.

      When this handler is called, Vertx.currentContext() will return this context.
      Context Vertx.getOrCreateContext()
      Gets the current context, or creates one if there isn't one
      Methods in io.vertx.core with parameters of type Context 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> Future<T> Future.fromCompletionStage(CompletionStage<T> completionStage, Context context)
      Bridges a CompletionStage object to a Vert.x future instance.
      void Verticle.init(Vertx vertx, Context context)
      Initialise the verticle with the Vert.x instance and the context.
      void AbstractVerticle.init(Vertx vertx, Context context)
      Initialise the verticle.
